Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{3: 'It takes them a while to finally find a strong enough building.'}
{3: 'Just when they have finished settling in for the night, a group of armed young scavengers appears.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Who gave you the okay to stay here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger C', 3: 'Why would we need your permission to stay here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Talking back now, uh?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He waves his hand for his minions to come forward.'}
{2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Say hello to our new friends here.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory6.jpg'}
{3: "The hoodlums wake up to the sunlight seeping through the hotel's cracked glasses."}
{3: 'Crying foul over the injustice, the scavengers crouch in the corner with bruises all over.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: "Let's send them to the commercial area today to see if they can find anything useful there...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He rubs his eyes as he says to the rest of his group.'}
{2: 'Minion', 3: 'All of you, stand up!'}
{3: 'He swings an iron pipe as he shouts his order to the scavengers trembling by the wall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger E', 3: 'God will not forgive you!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The girl's serious remark, however, is met with an outburst of laughter from the hoodlums."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'You can pray all you want.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger E', 3: "I'm sure God is out there! My dad and mom always told me that God is out there!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger E', 3: "I've seen an angel myself! It was that very angel from God who told me about there being supplies here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger E', 3: 'Aah!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl covers her mouth with her hands because she realizes she just said something she should not have. The young hoodlums, however, simply shrug it off as nonsense.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Oh? Well, did God come to save your parents?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The upset young girl takes a step back, again causing an outburst of laughter from the hoodlums.'}
{2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Enough chit-chat. Get them to work now. If they try anything funnyâ€”', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He does the cutthroat gesture with his thumb. With iron pipes in their hands, the other hoodlums start ushering the feeble scavengers out of the building.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{3: 'Not until it has turned dark that the scavengers trudge back to the abandoned hotel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: "What's the result?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He examines the items the scavengers have brought back and finds most of them useless.'}
{3: 'All except for one brand new supply bag, which stands out like a piece of cheese sitting on a mousetrap.'}
{3: 'Unbothered, he picks up the bag, takes out a can and some hardtacks and distributes them to his group.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Store the rest of it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger C', 3: 'What about us?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: "Huh? What made you think you'd get anything when this is all the lot of you came back with?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Want to have a taste of my rage for a change?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "We're almost there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Huh?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger D', 3: "He's crazy. Just ignore him...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: "Crazy, uh? Let's see if we can fix him. Won't do us no good keeping a madman around.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger E', 3: 'What are you trying to do?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl tries to stop the hoodlums but is held back by a pair of weak hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger D', 3: 'Youle, please...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger D', 3: "Let's just take care of ourselves for now...", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory6.jpg'}
{3: 'Starved and tired, the scavengers wake up to another day.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger A', 3: "I couldn't catch any sleep. I kept hearing waves splashing right behind the building.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger C', 3: 'So did I.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Right in the middle of their discussion about the mysterious waves last night, one of the hoodlums comes in.'}
{2: 'Minion', 3: "Where's the crazy dude?"}
{2: 'Minion', 3: 'We only tried to fix him a little.'}
{3: 'He looks at them without a trace of remorse, as if trying to tell them that they really only tried to "fix" him.'}
{3: 'They look around. The man, who was crouching in the corner before, is nowhere to be found now.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Youle', 3: "He didn't come back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Minion', 3: "Tsk. Then look for him when you're out looking for supplies later. Not that I care if he's found anyways."}
{3: 'After scratching his filthy hair, he raises a pipe and starts ushering them out of the room.'}
{2: 'Minion', 3: 'Hurry up and get to work!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{3: 'It is now dark, yet the man is still nowhere to be found.'}
{3: 'The scavengers come back again with nothing useful, except for another brand new supply bag.'}
{3: 'Having gotten nothing again, they go back to their corner, talking while trying to keep one another warm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'Cough, cough... My infection is getting worse.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger D', 3: 'Where did he go exactly?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger C', 3: "I wonder if we're going to hear the waves again tonight? I want to go and have a look...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'They seem to be having a conversation, but everyone is really just trying to vent, paying no attention to anyone else.'}
{2: 'Scavenger D', 3: 'Should we just leave this place, then?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He casts his eyes over the others as he raises the question. There is no way they can make it back in their current conditions.'}
{3: 'No one even knows what the supply hunt tomorrow will be like.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Youle', 3: "I'm sure we'll come back with plenty of supplies tomorrow. If we do, we'll all finally be able to eat.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl is feeling no better than anyone else, but she sounds as if she knows for certain what is going to happen the next day.'}
{2: 'Youle', 3: 'God will grant us happiness.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a helpless smile on his face, the man sitting before the girl pats her head with his wrinkled hand, thinking that she is talking out of her imagination.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger D', 3: "Yes, for sure... Let's call it a night for now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'They huddle together, shivering as they fall asleep.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'They hear people shouting and cursing in the middle of the night.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{2: 'Youle', 3: "What's that..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Hoodlum', 3: 'Stop right there, you thief! Catch him already!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger C', 3: 'But I was the one who found it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'They hear splashes of waves after the group of people dashes out of the building. Then, peace returns.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory6.jpg'}
{3: 'Youle wakes up to the midday sun from a deep sleep. It is now way past when the hoodlums would usually come.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Youle', 3: 'Where is everyone?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'One of the scavengers is missing. Could this have to do with the commotion last night?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'I saw them.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The old lady says, shivering so badly that she almost bites her own tongue.'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'I had a hard time falling asleep again last night. I went out to check on things when I heard the waves, and...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'The path just out the back entrance, it... It was all red.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'T-they came out of the red stuff and started talking to me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: "Scavenger C's Projection", 3: 'It tastes so good...'}
{2: "Scavenger C's Projection", 3: "I'm still alive..."}
{2: "Scavenger B's Projection", 3: "We're almost there."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory6.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger A', 3: "Could it be... That they're living in that red stuff?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'They are deep in thought when a group of scavengers they never saw before trudges into the room.'}
{2: 'New Scavenger', 3: 'Hello, is this place your turf?'}
